title: following provisions of the Coroners (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 29 of 2019)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Coroners (Amendment) Act 2019
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Coroners (Amendment) Act 2019 

(Commencement) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited coroner (amendment) act 2019 (commencement) order 2020

title: following provisions of the Coroners (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 29 of 2019)
heading: 2. The 16th day of January 2020 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 16th day of January 2020 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Coroners (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 29 of 2019) 
shall come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

section 21; 

sections 23 to 25; 

section 36; 

(d) 

section 39(d). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 January, 2020. 

CHARLES FLANAGAN, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st January, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [12] 3
